metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17812 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.14rc0, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function detoken() in asm/preproc.c that will cause a remote denial of service attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17812` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.10.09-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.10.09-1ubuntu0.1').
